p2pEscrowDesc: Your account is not yet configured for P2P Escrow. Click the button below to activate and set up P2P Escrow for testing.
setCallbacks: To set your callback URLs, <2>click here</2>
moreInfoEscrow: For more information on Instamoney P2P Escrow, <2>chat with us</2>
onceYouActivateEscrow: Once you activate P2P Escrow for testing, you will not be able to use our payment methods outside of the Escrow product.
youMustEscrow: This means that you must use the Instamoney Escrow APIs to accept and send payments for this account, instead of our regular APIs.
successActivate: Success activate P2P Escrow for testing
moreInfoRdl: For more information on Instamoney RDL, please contact your account manager or <2>chat with us</2>
